alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 03 at 2:25PM EDT until April 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 113 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN THE BIG BEND OF FLORIDA GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON MADISON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADEL, ALMA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, COOK CO A/P, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HOPEWELL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LITTMAN, LOVETT, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MASSEE, METCALF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, PASCO, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, SANTA CLARA, SPENCE AIRPORT, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WEBER, AND WETUMPKA.
